itsmetambui@gmail.com     
Bui Le Vu Tam 
+84 909 347694     
Full-stack Web Developer 
tam-bui-a52112174     
itsmetambui    
itsmetambui.herokuapp.com    
A versatile and passionate developer with three years of hands-on 
experience in web development and building single page 
applications. Obsessed with writing clean and reusable code 
through the application of TDD and design pattern. Looking for 
growth opportunities from a team-based atmosphere.
WORK EXPERIENCE 
Full Stack Developer 
Axon Active Vietnam 
08.2018                                                                                       Can Tho 
•Worked as a multi-national team, applied Agile 
development through Scrum framework. 
•Translated UI wireframes and mockups to 
responsive visual elements. 
•Refactored code to improve responsiveness by 
applying CSS grid and media queries. 
•Improved code coverage from 50% to 85%. 
Front End Engineer 
TMA Solutions 
05/2016                                                                               Ho Chi Minh 
•Collaborated with Nokia’s development team for 
a network management SPA. 
•Automated workflow using Grunt to minified JS 
and CSS, applied image optimization which 
reduced page load by 20%. 
•Created custom Angular components for an 
internal framework. 
•Developed micro-services using Docker and CI/
CD with Jenkins. 
TECHNICAL SKILLS 
Technologies 
  HTML5 CSS3 Javascript Java
Node Docker Jenkins
Framework/ Libraries 
  React Angular Express Spring
Technologies 
  MySQL MongoDB Firebase
SOFT SKILLS 
Ability To Work Under Pressure, Decision Making, 
Problem Solving, Leadership & Time Management. 
PROJECTS 
Slack Clone with React 
•Built a messaging application to practice React 
and Redux. 
•Developed the project using HTML, CSS, React 
and Firebase. 
SmartBrain 
•Built an SPA for face recognition to practice 
React and Node. 
•Developed the project using HTML, CSS, React, 
Node and PostgreSQL. 
Dandelion 
•Built a custom clothing store for graduation 
thesis. 
•Developed this project using MEAN stack. 
EDUCATION 
Bachelor degree in Software Engineering 
University of Can Tho 
2016                                                                                        GPA 3.2/4.0 
TOEIC certificate of achievement 
2015                                                                                             Score 945 
DELF A2 certificate 
2014                                                                                 Score 73.5/100

experiences.detail:
Can Tho •Worked as a multi-national team, applied Agile development through Scrum framework.
•Translated UI wireframes and mockups to responsive visual elements.
•Refactored code to improve responsiveness by applying CSS grid and media queries.
•Improved code coverage from 50% to 85%.

Ho Chi Minh •Collaborated with Nokia’s development team for a network management SPA. •Automated workflow using Grunt to minified JS and CSS, applied image optimization which reduced page load by 20%. •Created custom Angular components for an internal framework.
•Developed micro-services using Docker and CI/ CD with Jenkins.
